entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Use Microsoft.AspNetCore.Identity instead of Duende.IdentityServer for Blazor WebAssembly App with Individual Accounts and ASP.NET Core Hosted #46131
  • Azure AD and Azure AD B2C application roles using Application role manager with Microsoft Identity platform #46130
  • WebApplication.CreateBuilder ignores Logging:EventLog:SourceName #46128
  • [Blazor] Remove CustomElements package and samples from asplabs #46127
    .NET 8 Planning
  • AntiforgeryValidationException #46124
  • IClaimsTransformation do not automagically compose #46120
  • Please find a way to put .net and other popular components in the CDN for wasm #46119
  • [Kestrel] Count all traffic per request, including headers #46118
  • [Kestrel] HTTPS with ServerCertificateSelector, build full chain every connection, who to cache it? #46117

Closed

  • TEST: Automated move to AzDO #46061
  • Blazor: Navigation.BaseUri Incorrect on Forwarded Ports #45081
    Discussions
  • Unclear how you should respond to Parameter changing after #26230 #45152
    Discussions
  • custom inspect element for blazor #46107
  • Like other .net solutions, it is expected from blazor that if .net was uploaded from one app and it was available in the browser cache, there is no need to load .net in another program. #46123
  • Blazor WASM PWA app published to github pages - PWA not working, errors in console, cannot access .json file #46027
  • Implement IEndpointMetadataProvider on Result types like Forbid, Unauthorized, etc #45535
  • OutputCacheAttribute ignores excludeDefaultPolicy if a custom BasePolicy is defined #45564
  • net7.0 101 file upload crashes stackoverflow #45928

PullRequests

Created

  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `af74f44` to `83c2bdc` #46122
    area-infrastructure
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `9345421` to `356fc30` #46121
    area-infrastructure

Updated

  • Don't check in blazor.*.js files #45883
    area-blazor
  • Run test on Linux and Mac #45642
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Implement request timeout middleware #46115
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Introduce per-HealthCheckRegistration parameters #42646
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Guard against httpcontext disconnect race #42838
    area-runtime
  • Fix Blazor PageContext disposal #46097
    area-blazor
  • To get host address in Configure method of Startup class #46110
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Enumerate paramnames on startup #46086
    area-runtime, community-contribution
